full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
**08281-230037 - Invitation to Qualify: Architectural and Engineering Services for Embassy of Canada to Brazil, Brasilia**
## Reference Number
**WS4505620029-Doc4505667856**

## Tender Information
**Dates**

* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-25
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-09T14:00:00 (EDT)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-05-06

## Project Description
The Embassy of Canada to Brazil in Brasilia is soliciting Architectural and Engineering Services for a redevelopment of the Chancery. This Request for Qualification (RFQ) outlines the criteria for qualifying Respondents for this project. Interested Respondents must respond to this RFQ.

## Requirements
* **Services to be Provided**:
	+ Design
	+ Tender Call
	+ Construction Administration
	+ Contract Administration
	+ Post-Construction and Warranty Services
* **Project Location**: Brasilia, Brazil
* **Government Agency**: Global Affairs Canada (operational name for the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada)

## Tender Process
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and others

## Tender Documentation
	Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 9, 2024 at 14h00 (2:00 PM EDT).

**Attention Respondents:** All bids submitted after the closing time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

To submit a response and qualify for the range of services, please ensure that your submission meets all requirements outlined in this RFQ.

Note: This tender announcement is an invitation to qualify for the project. The Canada Government will select, based on the responses, the top five (5) Respondents to proceed to the Request for Proposal (RFP) stage. Their Responses will be used to determine which Respondents will be invited to proceed.

 Get in Touch
For more information, please contact Melissa Ruest at [melissa.ruest@tpsg
